notable_quotes: "Got hired by Apple this week to do a patent trial."
"What if I get it and can't resell?"
"i understand the fear. thats why we will condition the close on how the others sell"

public_knowledge.context: Kathy Ruemmler was White House Counsel under President Obama (2011-2014). Communication with Jeffrey Epstein would be of media interest given Epstein's notoriety.

analysis.summary: Email exchange between Kathy Ruemmler and Jeffrey Epstein discussing her new employment with Apple for a patent trial, travel plans to Dubai, and real estate investment concerns where Epstein offers to negotiate with developers on her behalf.
